SetBonus.4: When the equipper is within any <color=#FFFFFF>Ether Veil</color>, their CRIT Rate increases by 10%. After leaving the <color=#FFFFFF>Ether Veil</color>, this buff remains for 15s. If the equipper is an <color=#FFFFFF>Attack</color> character, activating an <color=#FFFFFF>Ether Veil</color> or extending an <color=#FFFFFF>Ether Veil</color>'s duration increases their CRIT Rate by 10% and ATK by 10% for 30s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
